content.query:
select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'https://synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/my-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]

    -- create external data source
    create external data source nyc_taxi_data
    with
         (
             location='abfss://my-taxi-data@synapsecourseadls25.dfs.core.windows.net/'
         )
-- retreving 

select 
     *
from
    openrowset(
        bulk 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data',
        format='csv',
        HEADER_row=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
    )
    with(
        LocationID smallint,
        Borough varchar(15),
        Zone varchar(50),
        service_zone varchar(15)
    )
    as [result]
